mapper.select: select po.po_id, pr.pr_name, co.co_supplyPrice, es.es_requiredDays, co.co_tradeTerms, pa.pa_name, ppr.ppr_dueDate, po.po_regDate, pa.pa_name, pr.pr_size, co_contractDate, ppr.ppr_quantity from purchaseorder po join procurementplanregistration ppr on po.ppr_id = ppr.ppr_id join contract co on ppr.co_id = co.co_id join estimate es on co.es_id = es.es_id join partner pa on es.pa_id = pa.pa_id join product pr on pa.pr_id = pr.pr_id

select po.po_id, pr.pr_name, co.co_supplyPrice, es.es_requiredDays, co.co_tradeTerms, pa.pa_name, ppr.ppr_dueDate, po.po_regDate, pa.pa_name, pr.pr_size, co_contractDate, ppr.ppr_quantity from purchaseorder po join procurementplanregistration ppr on po.ppr_id = ppr.ppr_id join contract co on ppr.co_id = co.co_id join estimate es on co.es_id = es.es_id join partner pa on es.pa_id = pa.pa_id join product pr on pa.pr_id = pr.pr_id where po.po_id = #{po_id}
